attributes.action: cause the waste of money on Lifts Attendats in the Houses of PAELIAMENT TO BE STOPPED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a waste of public funds to employ Lift attendants in any government office- particularly at £17000 We call for the phasing out of such posts by natural wasteage and the withdrawal of any current or future adverts for such post.  Issues regarding wheelchair users will have to be dealt with, but all MPs should be able to open a door and know their numbers and thus operate a lift

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
